Menace, deathtouch
When this creature transforms into Kronya, Gleaming Blade, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
[i]Agarthan Technology[/i] – Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets -2/-0 until your next turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Kronya deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature.
